To convert a sentence into passive Voice:
- Identify the active subject (doer) and the action performed.
- Move the active Subject to the end of the Sentence while keeping the Action as Verb’s past participle.
- Add ‘was/Are/Were/Has/Have Been’ at the beginning depending upon Present/Past/Future Tense respectively.
